alert.note: Alert for Lowndes; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lowndes and central Montgomery Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 215 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hope Hull, or 10 miles southwest of Montgomery, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Montgomery, Pike Road, Hyundai Motors Of Alabama, Auburn University In Montgomery, Woodcrest, Maxwell Air Force Base, Snowdoun, Waugh, Lagoon Park, Pintlala, Alabama State University, Hope Hull, Dannelly Field, Eastdale Mall, Mount Meigs, Montgomery Riverwalk Stadium, Pinedale, Alabama State Capitol, Gunter Air Force Base and Mitylene. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
